snippet: The United Nations Security Council is poised to adopt a resolution authorizing European militaries to “inspect” and “seize” ships suspected of being used for human smuggling.
abstract: United Nations Security Council is set to accept resolution allowing European militaries to police Mediterranean Sea for human traffickers.

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The United Nations Security Council is poised to adopt a resolution authorizing European militaries to “inspect” and “seize” ships suspected of being used for human smuggling.

headline.print_headline: United Nations; A Plan to Impede Human Smuggling
headline.main: U.N. Council Plan to Impede Human Smuggling
